ForwardDistanceReward: Range: (-inf, inf)',  # Continuous unbounded, as it measures the difference in x-coordinate, which can be any real number.
ProgressTowardsGoalReward: Range: (-inf, inf)',  # Continuous unbounded, as it measures the change in x-coordinate, which can also be any real number.
HealthyZPositionCount: Range: {0, 1}',  # Discrete values, as it returns 1 if healthy and 0 otherwise.
TotalTorqueExerted: Range: [0, inf)',  # Continuous semi-bounded, as it measures the total torque exerted, which cannot be negative.
MeanJointAngularVelocities: Range: [0, inf)',  # Continuous semi-bounded, as it averages the absolute values of joint velocities.
TorqueApplicationFrequency: Range: [0, inf)',  # Continuous semi-bounded, as it measures the total torque, which is also non-negative.
MaxJointAngleDeviation: Range: [0, inf)',  # Continuous semi-bounded, as it measures the maximum deviation from expected angles, which cannot be negative.
TrajectoryChangeCount: Range: [0, inf)',  # Continuous semi-bounded, as it measures distance moved, which is non-negative.
OrientationStability: Range: (-inf, 0)',  # Continuous semi-bounded, as it returns negative changes in orientation, indicating stability (more negative is worse).
JointPerformanceIndex: Range: [0, inf)',  # Continuous semi-bounded, as it is based on the ratio of angular velocities to torque, which can be non-negative.
MovementOscillationCount: Range: [0, inf)',  # Continuous semi-bounded, as it measures distance moved, which is non-negative.
